table.name: vtiger_hrm_qcm
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrm_qcm` ( `qcmid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `qcm_title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `qcm_code` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `qcm_category` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `qcm_classify` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `qcm_created` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `qcm_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `fined` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `description` text DEFAULT NULL, `position` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`qcmid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hrm_qcmcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrm_qcmcf` ( `qcmid` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`qcmid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
